title: Bloomberg Markets: Cordaro Says Earnings Driving Bull Market
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cordaro Says Earnings Driving Bull Market
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Christopher J Cordaro\u0010Chief Investment Officer\u0010RegentAtlantic \u0010Discussing his belief that the single biggest driver of the market in 2017 has been, and will continue to be, earnings growth.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
